specific case this was on a PLL request that I made to uh code sandbox and I was
adding in the ability to basically go in and find the type definition files for

actually doing that was doing that for every single file and then returning but because I was doing an async fetch of
those files inside of a for Loop and not actually capturing the promises that were being returned from that and then
waiting on that the method would just immediately return and it would result
in the code thinking that it had successfully loaded all of the files but then them not being there so then the

of hidden in the new uh syntetic sugar of the language with like ASN KO and all
of that I wasn't thinking about returning the the promise from each one of those so I had to go in and change it

array of promises before the function would actually return so that it would hold up the rest of the parsing until
